statements: DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND date_of_birth < '1980-01-01';
DELETE FROM MedicalHistory WHERE patient_id = 101 AND date_visited <= '2021-08-01';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%London%' AND last_name = 'Smith';
DELETE FROM treatment_information WHERE patient_id = 100 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Treatment WHERE patient_id = 201 AND treatment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM MedicalHistory WHERE patient_id = 100 AND medical_condition = 'Diabetes';
DELETE FROM Treatment WHERE patient_id = (SELECT patient_id FROM Demographic WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe') AND treatment_date < '2022-01-01';
